name: A night at the office
description:
"A night at the office" is a very short, interactive fiction game that I created on Twine.  This is the first game I've made, and I hope that you enjoy playing this game as much as I enjoyed making it!

Content warning:

There is some violence in the story, including attempted and actual murder depending on which choices you make, but it's non-graphically described for the most part. 

How to play:

  • Click on the options to progress further in the story. There are two good ends, and several bad ends.  
  • Click the icon in the lower-right corner of the screen to play the game in fullscreen, which I recommend. 

Credits:

"A night at the office" is developed and published by ClariLaGames.

The game was made on Twine.

The one image for this game was made on Canva.
